name: appbox-supervisor
description: Appbox core: supervisor. Responsible for keeping various important parts of appbox (server, engine, backends) up and running. Can interact with the filesystem.
author: Vic van Cooten

scripts.updateClient: git -C /AppBox/System/Client pull && yarn --cwd ../Client install && yarn --cwd ../Client build
scripts.updateServer: git -C /AppBox/System/Server reset --hard && git -C /AppBox/System/Server pull && yarn --cwd ../Server install
scripts.updateEngine: git -C /AppBox/System/Engine reset --hard && git -C /AppBox/System/Engine pull && yarn --cwd ../Engine install
scripts.updateBox: yarn updateClient && yarn updateServer && yarn updateSiteServer && yarn updateSupervisor
scripts.stop: yarn stopSupervisor & yarn stopServer & yarn stopEngine
scripts.restart: DBURL=${DBURL:-localhost:27017} yarn restartSupervisor & DBURL=${DBURL:-localhost:27017} yarn restartServer & DBURL=${DBURL:-localhost:27017} yarn restartEngine
